label: Download
description: Download the film in DRM-free, high quality 1080p. Deluxe edition includes director commentary.

label: DVD
description: Get a DVD of the deluxe edition of the film, which includes director commentary.

description: Get a Blu-ray of the deluxe edition of the film, which includes director commentary.

label: Fan Pack
description: Get the deluxe edition of the film in your choice of digital download, DVD, or Blu-ray, plus your choice of two App Stories (the nearly uncut interviews of all interviewees; we'll let you pick your two when the film is released), a t-shirt, and a poster.
